alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 2:44PM CDT until July 28 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 244 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Estes, or 9 miles southeast of Downtown Little Rock, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... England... Wrightsville... Keo... Sweet Home... Estes... Meto... Toltec Mounds State Park... Scott... Baucum... Bevis Corner... Higgins... Bredlow Corner... Willow Beach... Toltec... Woodson... Kerr... Terry Lock and Dam... College Station... This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 166 and 168. Interstate 530 between mile markers 3 and 5. Interstate 440 between mile markers 5 and 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
